publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-936 Mr Keith Harding: Top Award for Fife Beaches—That the Parliament congratulates the Kingdom of Fife on providing all three of the Scottish beaches, at Silver Sands, Aberdour, West Sands, St Andrews and Elie beach, which have been awarded the European Blue Flag, in recognition of their clean water and beach management standards.

S1M-936 Mr Keith Harding: Top Award for Fife Beaches-That the Parliament congratulates the Kingdom of Fife on providing all three of the Scottish beaches, at Silver Sands, Aberdour, West Sands, St Andrews and Elie beach, which have been awarded the European Blue Flag, in recognition of their clean water and beach management standards. Supported by: Bill Aitken*, David Mundell*
S1M-936 Top Award for Fife Beaches (lodged on 1 June 2000) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S1M-936 Top Award for Fife Beaches (lodged on 1 June 2000) Mr Brian Monteith*

S1M-936 Mr Keith Harding: Top Award for Fife Beaches-That the Parliament congratulates the Kingdom of Fife on providing all three of the Scottish beaches, at Silver Sands, Aberdour, West Sands, St Andrews and Elie beach, which have been awarded the European Blue Flag, in recognition of their clean water and beach management standards. Supported by: Bill Aitken, David Mundell, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr Brian Monteith
S1M-936 Top Award for Fife Beaches (lodged on 1 June 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*

S1M-936 Mr Keith Harding: Top Award for Fife Beaches—That the Parliament congratulates the Kingdom of Fife on providing all three of the Scottish beaches, at Silver Sands, Aberdour, West Sands, St Andrews and Elie beach, which have been awarded the European Blue Flag, in recognition of their clean water and beach management standards. Supported by: Bill Aitken, David Mundell, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Nick Johnston*

S1M-936 Mr Keith Harding: Top Award for Fife Beaches—That the Parliament congratulates the Kingdom of Fife on providing all three of the Scottish beaches, at Silver Sands, Aberdour, West Sands, St Andrews and Elie beach, which have been awarded the European Blue Flag, in recognition of their clean water and beach management standards. Supported by: Bill Aitken, David Mundell, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Nick Johnston
